FOR MEDIA 15 JULY 1988
I have today sent the following message to Mr
Mr Charlie Yankos of the Socceroos: Frank Arok and
" Congratulations on a superb, history-making victory by the
Socceroos over the world champions. We are all enormously
proud of you. I wish the team all the best against Brazil
on Sunday and am looking forward to being part of the huge
crowd which your efforts deserve.
Bob Hawke" 3 ( 7 67
